Articles.Content:
Will my new desktop rig be able to handle alot of objects in the game?

Spec:

Amd phenom black 2 x4 3.4 ghz

evga superclocked geforce gtx 560

and 8 gbs of ram.

Sorry this is my first time posting my new desktop rig i'll get on Christmas with my saved money.

But Im sonicboom on my emachine i created a aircraft that could go 300 m.s so i decided to name me sonic boom.

Sorry im don't speak english. I got a writing problem...

Your new system should handle KSP just fine.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

PS: You're English isn't that bad.
